title: Plugin tools not being registered/loaded
description:
Plugin tools (worktrunk-list, worktrunk-status, worktrunk-create, worktrunk-switch, worktrunk-remove, worktrunk-default-branch) are not being recognized by the agent.

Symptoms:
- Agent tries to execute tools as bash commands (e.g., 'worktrunk-list')
- Error: 'zsh:1: command not found: worktrunk-list'
- All eval examples that require plugin tools fail

Plugin code appears correct:
- Tools are registered using tool() from @opencode-ai/plugin
- Tools are exported in the tool object returned from plugin
- Tool definitions include descriptions, args, and execute functions

Possible causes:
- Plugin not loading properly despite 'fixing plugin loading'
- Tool registration happening after agent initialization
- Plugin path or configuration issue
- Version mismatch in @opencode-ai/plugin

This is blocking all eval tests that require plugin tools.
